pages.text: The Dreden are undead creatures that roam the cold regions of the Overworld. From afar, they attack with magical balls of Frost, and when close they will either attack with a surprising amount of strength or breath a torrent of frost upon their foes.
As you can guess, they are immune to frost damage, and will float gently down when falling.

pages.title: Cold Shards
pages.text: Dredens can drop Cold Shards when vanquished. These shards can be used to craft Arrows of Slowness, Blue Ice or as components for creating new Focus or other magical items.
